title: PLEASE HELP!!!!
body:
Posted this in gameplay but no feed back yet i dont understand ive never had this problem until last few weeks.

I have my drag scroll set to middle mouse button so i dont have to hit sides of screen for map.

The problem- When i hold ctrl i cant hold middle mouse button to move my screen it cancels screen movement or something.

Any answers? recently found ctrl was culprit thought my mouse was broken luckily my mouse survived a few slams from it ,and i now know that it is whenever i use ctrl my push to talk it makes camera movement stop.

replies.body:
So either the keyboard had a malfunction and may a simple restart fix it or you can buy a new keyboard. Or try to put push to talk in another button like C and see if it still messes with middle click. 

I still believe that you somehow try to give windows a command but windows cant do it cause you are in a game.

Your welcome my friend. FYI sometimes software in PC/mouse/keyboard/mobile get error that cant find solution by themselves and may enter a infinite loop like everytime you press Ctrl shit happens. More info  like this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lish5QFp81E. You can search for more in google.
Yeah just decided to forget the basics im dumb for not trying that.

Actually i havn't tried restarting yet i will give that a try. But i do play league like 5-8hours a day and it happened in last couple patches. i've made no changes to computer or key bindings. 

I've had ctrl bound to push to talk for 10ish + years so it'd be impossible to break that habbit.... :'(

Ill attempt a computer restart see if that works ill report back after.

I copy my answer in your  other post

That happens because PC has an actual function on Ctrl + Scroll ( i think its zoom in and out). So you are giving the PC the command to zoom in/out but LoL doesnt have such a command so it stops the movement command. I suggest put the push to talk button somewhere else ( keyboard or mouse side buttons) or get an microphone with mic On/Off button.

i shut off push to talk and turned off team speak 3 that did not fix things.
